\Aura\Input

\Aura\InputCollection

Represents a collection of fieldsets of a single type.

The data for each fieldset in the collection.

filter()

filter() : bool

Applies each fieldset filter.

Returns

bool —

True if all filters passed, false if one or more failed.

Tags

getMessages()

getMessages(mixed $key) : array

Returns the messages for the fieldset filters.

Parameters

The fieldset key to return messages for; if null, returns messages from all fieldsets.
